name: MISSING(); (starshums)
description:
Evil Skullatron 6000, kidnaps your pet, and steals and scatters your memory chips across the lands. Regain your memories, dodge enemies, rescue your pet, and destroy the evil Skullatron once and for all!

This was our submission for the Global Game Jam Online 2021!

The theme was Lost and Found

Submission Page : Missing (); | Global Game Jam Online
